summary: In 1961, a Soviet medical officer is conflicted about his position overseeing the health of future cosmonauts.
cast: Merab Ninidze|Chulpan Khamatova|Anastasiya Shevelyova|Aleksandr Glebov|Ruslan Ibragimov|Fyodor Lavrov|Polina Filonenko|Valentin Kuznetsov|Kirill Ulyanov|Ramil Salakhutdinov|Mikhail Gendelev|Oleg Grinchenko|Albert Makarov|Konstantin Shelestun|Igor Kechayev|Anna Yekaterininskaya|Igor Zhilkin|Oleg Kovalov|Irina Rakshina|Tariel Keniya|Anatoliy Kondyubov|Sergei Naumov|Denis Reyshakhrit|Sergey Anisiforov|Yuriy Ashikhmin|Sergey Khomchenkov|Ilya Mozgovoy|Olga Presnyakova|Yakov Shamshin|Vadim Smirnov|Aleksandr Tyurin|Polina Vorobeva
director: Director: Aleksey German Jr. (as Aleksey German)
title: Bumazhnyy soldat
